meanings.definition: A person or thing that wins something
meanings.sent1: The winner of the race crossed the finish line first.
meanings.sent2: She was the winner of the spelling bee competition.
meanings.sent3: The winner of the dance-off did a victory dance that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Being the winner in life's race requires determination and perseverance.
meanings.sent5: The young girl proudly held up her trophy as the ultimate winner of the art contest.

meanings.sent1: The entrepreneur was a winner in the business world.
meanings.sent2: Despite facing challenges, she remained a winner in her career.
meanings.sent3: The winner of the science fair had a successful experiment that amazed everyone.
meanings.sent4: Becoming a winner in life often involves hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The team celebrated their victory, feeling like true winners in the game.

meanings.definition: A victor in a contest or competition
meanings.sent1: The winner of the chess tournament was a strategic player.
meanings.sent2: He proudly held the trophy as the ultimate winner of the singing competition.
meanings.sent3: The winner of the pie-eating contest had a full stomach and a big smile.
meanings.sent4: She emerged as the clear winner in the debate competition.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered for the winner of the talent show, impressed by their performance.
